messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re Robin's post
messages.msgSnippet: I will agree here...  I have just taken myself off the list as I can t keep up at all either, and figured it was better to stop for a few days... Ann
messages.messageBody:
I will agree here... I have just taken myself off the list as I can't keep up
at all either, and figured it was better to stop for a few days...
Ann

messages.subject: Re Robin's post
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh, Robin, thanks for writing what I ve been thinking for a few days now! I ve been meaning to write much same thing, but keep getting distracted by other
messages.messageBody:
At 7:30 PM +0000 5/5/01, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
>Message: 13
> Date: Sat, 5 May 2001 08:05:21 -0700
> From: "DiamondAir" <diamondair@...>
>Subject: A request
>
>Now I'm not the list owner or anything, I'm just
>saying this as my own personal observation. I hope I'm not offending anyone
>or stepping on anyone's toes. so this is my own personal request: I'd ask
>people to think before they post if what they are saying adds to the list
>as a whole.

Oh, Robin, thanks for writing what I've been thinking for a few days
now! I've been meaning to write much same thing, but keep getting
distracted by other stuff (see my next posts), and I kept thinking it
would all settle back down again...

I *have* enjoyed the wonderful posts from Valerie and Laurie and
everyone else, but I've had a hard time keeping up even with this
list on digest!

Anyway, thanks for writing what you did. As listowner, I'm with you 100%.

Helen
